definition: Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology

sentences.english: The Qin Dynasty holds chin, turning brain to looking at ghost will fix Luo.
sentences.chinese: 秦朝捏着下巴，回頭看着鬼將修羅。

sentences.english: When Sakka had said this verse, the devas applauded but the asuras were silent.
sentences.chinese: 天帝釋唱此偈時，諸天歡呼，阿修羅默然。

sentences.english: And I do not think there is anything wrong of Asura.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有認爲阿修羅有什麼不好。

sentences.english: He is member of the cultural shura of the movement.
sentences.chinese: 他是運動中“文化修羅”的一員。

sentences.english: The asuras live on the sea bottom.
Through the autumn fields; his steed, swift as typhoon winds; the arrow, fleeter.
sentences.chinese: 秋野修羅場，騏驥奔馳神風助，追矢似飛蝗。

sentences.english: I think Ashura is a very interesting material.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得阿修羅是非常有意思的物質。

sentences.english: Way to fix all the blessing of a day, but without the virtue of nature, natural disposition is aggressive.
sentences.chinese: 修羅道衆生有天的福，但無天人之德，生性好鬥。

sentences.english: The male Asura is extremely ugly and furious, and they always fight with each other.
sentences.chinese: 男性阿修羅是非常醜陋，憤怒，他們總是互相鬥爭。

sentences.english: Asura is one peculiar kind of the six destinies(ways).
sentences.chinese: 阿修羅是特有的六道衆生之一。

sentences.english: Now the prayer is that "we Gods may quell our Asura foemen."
sentences.chinese: “現在，祈禱的是，”我們可以平息我們的神阿修羅。

definition: Zhang Fei (168-221), general of Shu and blood-brother of Liu Bei in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, famous as fearsome fighter and lover of wine
to guard/to protect/bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)
ODA Nobunaga (1534-1582), Japanese shogun (warlord), played an important role in unifying Japan
the feeling of actually being there
